translations: 持续存在的，仍在进行的，不断发展的

sentences.sentence: When Pemberton created his drink, it represented an ongoing trend.
sentences.translation: 当彭伯顿发明他的饮料时，它代表了一种持续的趋势。

sentences.sentence: They were also more likely to have an ongoing medical condition and be overweight.
sentences.translation: 他们也更有可能出现持续的病症和超重问题。
警方的调查在持续进行中。
